misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a competitor hailing from the esteemed Golf Pirkkala, is poised to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. A Tampere resident, Ofri brings a measured approach to the competition, carefully plotting each shot.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have thus far eluded him, Ofri's consistent play demonstrates an unwavering dedication to the sport. He has participated in the Hector Trophée twice before, always displaying great composure and sportsmanship.

Off the course, Ofri is known for his quiet contemplation and appreciation of course design. He has often expressed his admiration for the thoughtful designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, whose work continues to inspire golfers around the world.
